word_mean: 多形〔态〕，多形变态：有几个不同形态的性质
多态性一个种群内，个体之间的基因型差别现象。
同一个物种内的个体具有明显的形态上区别的现象。如东亚飞蝗具有群居相和散居相。

sentence.Network_en: Concurring with expectations, the degree of polymorphism was highest in the central.
sentence.Network_cn: 正如所料, 多型性程度在中部种群中最高.

sentence.Network_en: Polymorphism in elements is called allotropy.
sentence.Network_cn: 把元素中的多晶现象称为同素异构性.

sentence.Network_en: The result of CSS polymorphism is a combinatorial explosion of possibilities.
sentence.Network_cn: CSS多态性的结果是各种可能的组合猛增.

弗洛伊德相信个体原欲的发展，如升华（sublimation）概念所示，为不断转换客体。人生来即属“多相变态”（polymorphously perverse），任何客体都可能成为快感之源。随不同发展阶段，人会固著于特定欲望客体——初为（oral stage）.

means.word_mean: 1. (chemistry) the existence of different kinds of crystal of the same chemical compound
2. (biology) the existence of two or more forms of individuals within the same animal species (independent of sex differences)

auth_sentence.content: There was no evidence for intraspecific polymorphism in regard to the presence or absence of the repetitive element.
